resources.string: Attention! Already there are processes running! The program will run only
You can abort the download, then it will continue from where it stopped

After the successful launch can close, PHP and MySQL will continue to run in the background. 
 We recommend using Opera Mobile to view, create the local web pages. URL - http://localhost:8080.
 * User MySQL - root
 * password MySQL - leave empty
 * host MySQL - 127.0.0.1
 * database name - mysql.
